title: UPware 12-Piece Melamine Dinnerware Set, Includes Dinner Plates, Salad Plates, Bowls, Service for 4. (Sea Turtle)
features: Size: Dinner Plate-11 inch dia. x 3/4 inch H, Salad Plate-9 inch dia. x 7/8 inch H, Bowl-8 inch dia. x 2 inch H
Care & Clean: Dishwasher Safe. Do not use in microwave.
Includes: 4-Piece Dinner Plate, 4-Piece Salad Plate and 4-Piece Bowl

Our dinnerware set is conveniently stackable to keep your kitchen neat and organized and save space in drawers and cabinets. Each dinnerware set makes an ideal housewarming gift for your friends and relatives. Perfect for home, party, beach, picnic, camping, or vacation.
description: Set a gorgeous dinner table with sealife print pieces that coordinate perfectly. These sealife melamine dinnerware set are attractive, functional and a welcome addition to any indoor or outdoor table. It's shatterproof and food safe properties, perfect for entertaining, this set will be a fun addition to your nautical and beach party, or use daily to add a bit of joy to your everyday. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe.
